channel.title: Client Cache [PI]
channel.description: My client auto downloads the cache and all of my friends can download the cache except one friend. Every time you open up the client, it freezes when it downloads the cache... Please help! This also happens whenever he opens up the client sometimes it downloads the cache up to 6% then freezes. And he cant auto download cache for any client or server.

item.title: Client Cache [PI]
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

go into your c: drive and .zip or .rar your cache, then send it to him manually and get him to extract it to his c: drive.

Read full topic
